update openreport
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update openreport set course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_meaning = #{courseMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_overview = #{currentOverview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, research_content = #{researchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, research_mind = #{researchMind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, research_schedule = #{researchSchedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_time = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_place = #{meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_host = #{meetingHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher1_id = #{teacher1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher2_id = #{teacher2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher3_id = #{teacher3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meeting_summary = #{meetingSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advice = #{advice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update openreport set result = #{auditStatus},advice=#{advice} where course_id= #{course_id} and version=( select max(a.version) from (select version from openreport where course_id=#{course_id}) a )
